title: The Queen's Awards for Enterprise - Innovation

details.short_description: Gives businesses the chance to compete for an award acknowledging significant achievement in innovation
details.eligibility:
Businesses must:

- be based in the UK and employ at least 2 full-time employees
- demonstrate substantial improvement in business performance and commercial success
details.additional_information:
Achievements may be assessed for any of the following:

- invention, design, production of goods
- performance of services
- marketing, distribution and after sale support of goods or services
details.body:
Annual awards to recognise and reward UK companies that have developed commercially successful innovative products or services. Businesses may apply under the following criteria:

  • outstanding innovation sustained over 2 years or more
  • continuous innovation sustained over 2 years or more
